article.title: General Atomics to Provide Control Stations and Data Terminals
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems Incorporated, Poway, California, was awarded a $68,961,778 cost-plus-incentive-fee contract for universal ground control stations and universal ground data terminals. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
